001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Dates;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.LastBGRequest;
010
011import java.time.Instant;
012
013/**
014 * This message ONLY returns BGs entered via the Bolus Calculator, and NOT the most recent CGM
015 * reading.
016 */
017/**
018 * This message ONLY returns BGs entered via the Bolus Calculator, and NOT the most recent CGM
019 * reading.
020 *
021
022 *
023 * <br>
024 *
025 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.LastBGRequest}, opCode 51, size 7
026 *
027 * <br>
028 *
029 * 
030 * <table border='1'>
031 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
032 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>51</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
033 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>7</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
034 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
035 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.LastBGRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
036 * </table>
037 */@MessageProps(
038    opCode=51,
039    size=7,
040    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
041    request=LastBGRequest.class
042)
043public class LastBGResponse extends Message {
044    
045    private long bgTimestamp;
046    private int bgValue;
047    private int bgSourceId;
048    private BgSource bgSource;
049    
050    public LastBGResponse() {}
051    
052    public LastBGResponse(long bgTimestamp, int bgValue, int bgSourceId) {
053        this.cargo = buildCargo(bgTimestamp, bgValue, bgSourceId);
054        this.bgTimestamp = bgTimestamp;
055        this.bgValue = bgValue;
056        this.bgSourceId = bgSourceId;
057        this.bgSource = getBgSource();
058    }
059
060    public LastBGResponse(long bgTimestamp, int bgValue, BgSource bgSource) {
061        this.cargo = buildCargo(bgTimestamp, bgValue, bgSource.getId());
062        this.bgTimestamp = bgTimestamp;
063        this.bgValue = bgValue;
064        this.bgSourceId = bgSource.getId();
065        this.bgSource = getBgSource();
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * <table border="1">
070     * <caption>Parsed fields for LastBGResponse:</caption>
071     * <tr><td><code>bgTimestamp</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
072     * <tr><td><code>bgValue</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 4)</code></td></tr>
073     * <tr><td><code>bgSourceId</code></td><td><code>raw[6]</code></td></tr>
074     * <tr><td><code>bgSource</code></td><td><code>getBgSource()</code></td></tr>
075     * </table>
076     */
077    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
078        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
079        this.cargo = raw;
080        this.bgTimestamp = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0);
081        this.bgValue = Bytes.readShort(raw, 4);
082        this.bgSourceId = raw[6];
083        this.bgSource = getBgSource();
084        
085    }
086
087    
088    /**
089     * <table border="1">
090     * <caption>Byte layout for LastBGResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
091     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
092     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>toUint32(bgTimestamp) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
093     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>toUint32(bgTimestamp) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
094     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>toUint32(bgTimestamp) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
095     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(bgTimestamp) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
096     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bgValue) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
097     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bgValue) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
098     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>(byte) bgSource</code></td></tr>
099     * </table>
100     */
101    public static byte[] buildCargo(long bgTimestamp, int bgValue, int bgSource) {
102        return Bytes.combine(
103            Bytes.toUint32(bgTimestamp), 
104            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bgValue), 
105            new byte[]{ (byte) bgSource });
106    }
107    
108    public long getBgTimestamp() {
109        return bgTimestamp;
110    }
111
112    public Instant getBgTimestampInstant() {
113        return Dates.fromJan12008EpochSecondsToDate(bgTimestamp);
114    }
115
116    public int getBgValue() {
117        return bgValue;
118    }
119    public int getBgSourceId() {
120        return bgSourceId;
121    }
122    public BgSource getBgSource() {
123        return BgSource.fromId(bgSourceId);
124    }
125
126    public enum BgSource {
127        // TODO: confirm
128        MANUAL(0),
129        CGM(1),
130        ;
131
132        private final int id;
133        BgSource(int id) {
134            this.id = id;
135        }
136
137        public int getId() {
138            return id;
139        }
140
141        public static BgSource fromId(int id) {
142            for (BgSource b : values()) {
143                if (b.id == id) {
144                    return b;
145                }
146            }
147            return null;
148        }
149    }
150    
151}
